jobDescription: Job Summary: Company: Artech Information Systems LLC Position: Data Analyst Duration: 12 Months Location: Palo Alto, CA Job Reference Code: 18-28910Job Description: HM is open to SF as long as temp will be in Palo Alto 2-3 days/week.  Note: Data being worked on is related to HR functions such as Recruiting or Staffing so any previous experience in this industry is a plus. Project Overview: We are looking for people with a strong analytical sense to work as assistants in a Data Science team  This position is not for someone with statistics or machine learning background and does not require computer programming skills  Applied business background is preferred  The key tasks involve manual labeling of various pieces of information Overall Responsibilities: An aptitude for making proactive, autonomous judgements regarding the classification of concepts in moderately complex situations  A flexibility to adjust to new instructions regularly  An ability to communicate effectively in English, both verbal and written  A capacity to work on a computer for extended amounts of time while staying focused and working at a fast pace  An attention to detail and being OK with the repetitive nature of the job Top 3 Daily Responsibilities: Will assist Data Curation Team to normalize and clean data as they relate to client defined search criteria  Will work directly with core Team of 5 data scientist in client Cloud organization  Will focus on review and research of data collected Required Skills: AA/AS degree in Human Resources/ Employment and/or related discipline  2-4 years of experience working within Human Resources  1-3 years of experience working, generating, compiling and analyzing data  Must have 1+ years of experience working with target demographics and interpreting data  Must have 1+ years of experience with any of the following: (Data Curation, Data Manipulation, Data Analysis, Data Normalization) Nice to have Skills (not required): BA/BS Degree in Human Resources/ Employment and/or related discipline  Someone with prior working experience a plus  Data being worked on is related to HR functions such as Recruiting or Staffing so any previous experience in this industry is a plus  Madan Poovaiah  Manager - Staffing  Artech Information Systems LLC  360 Mt. Kemble Avenue, Suite 2000 | Morristown, NJ 07960  Office: 973.967.3519 | Fax: 973.998.2599  Email: madan.pooviah@artechinfo.com | Website: www.artechinfo.com  LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/madan-poovaiah-715ab43/
